data.event: Jamestown was founded in 1878, and was incorporated as a city in 1883.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1883

data.event: Jamestown was founded in 1878, and was incorporated as a city in 1883.

event.title: was opened in Alva (an extinct town) in 1871

data.event: A post office was opened in Alva (an extinct town) in 1871, but it was moved to Jamestown in 1878.
A post office was opened in Alva (an extinct town) in 1871, but it was moved to Jamestown in 1878.
History repeated itself on January 28, 2000 when another fire consumed several buildings on Main Street and spread to the city hall.
